Here are some sample outputs to prove it works.

The first m is the input of the encryption and the second is after it has been decrypted.

test 1

g = 170141183460469231729282460765291185143
p = 170141183460469231736496989617069946903
y = 154522824812566812149882608100181403147
m = 14940625869544938689
r = 19495713198158312176575133514580464048
s = 96669540113946311916227756024501583159
m = 14940625869544938689

test 2

g = 170141183460469231722769005335090763056
p = 170141183460469231749523900477470791077
y = 157687940558083194227500241426075042731
m = 12324257347343
r = 157687940558083194227500241426075042731
s = 120702020350002205588052311256492700587
m = 12324257347343

test 3

g = 170141183460469231727182716622726358401
p = 170141183460469231740696477902199600387
y = 55295924201132073719140462179500347006
m = 7
r = 105730743172475934990751856493588298351
s = 42480521147849737646166277488683225197
m = 7
